mapper.select: SELECT free_board_comment.id as id, user_id as userId, content, created_at as createdAt, like_count as likeCount, nick_name as name FROM free_board_comment join user on user.id = user_id WHERE board_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into free_board_comment (board_id, user_id, content) values (#{id}, #{userId}, #{content})
